verbose_text: Immunostaining of non permeabilized cells with antibody to the alpha2 integrin subunit (CD49b) and analysis by flow cytometry showed that expression of total cell surface alpha2 integrin was enhanced by 1.9-fold (P < 0.0001) in DDR1 over-expressing cells compared with wild type cells and reduced by 35% in cells with DDR1 knockdown (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of total cell surface alpha2 integrin
